mapper.sql: CS_ID, CS_UID, CS_ORGANID, CS_CERTID, CS_ORGANNAME, CS_YCSNAME, CS_YCSCERTNUM, CS_SHIPCHECKTIME, CS_SEX, CS_BIRTHDATE,CS_PROVCODE,CS_EDUCERTCODE,CS_MAJORNAME,CS_EDUCERTCODE1,CS_MAJORNAME1, CS_POSITIONNAME, CS_LEADERSTATUS, CS_OCEANYEAR, CS_IDT, CS_UDT, CS_STATE, CS_PROVNAME, CS_TELPHONE, CS_EMAIL
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,(select co_orgaddr from cis_organinfo t where t.co_orgcode = cs_organid and rownum = 1) as ORGADDR from CIS_SURVEYOR
order by ${orderByClause}
select cs_cerlevel as cerlevel, cs_major as major from cis_surcertificate where cs_ycscertnum = #{ycscertnum} order by cs_granttime

select t.cs_id as cid, t1.cs_uid as cuid, t1.cs_ycsname as name, t1.cs_organname as org, t.cs_cerno as certno, t.cs_cerlevel as clevel, t.cs_major as major, substr(t.cs_granttime,1,10) as grantdate, substr(t.cs_issuedate,1,10) as issuedate from cis_surcertificate t inner join cis_surveyor t1 on t.cs_ycscertnum = t1.cs_uid where t.cs_ycscertnum = #{ycscertnum} order by t.cs_granttime

select DISTINCT t.cs_id as cid, t1.cs_uid as cuid, t1.cs_ycsname as name, t1.cs_organname as org, t.cs_cerno as certno, t.cs_cerlevel as clevel, case when cs_cerlevel = '特殊资格' then (select t1.dictdata_name from dic_code t1 where t1.dict_cate='68' and t1.dictdata_value=t.cs_major) else cs_major end as major, substr(t.cs_granttime,1,10) as grantdate, substr(t.cs_issuedate,1,10) as issuedate from cis_surcertificate t inner join cis_surveyor t1 on t.cs_ycscertnum = t1.cs_uid where t1.cs_organid = #{organid}

select t.csr_id as id, t.csr_surid as surid, t.csr_orgid as orgid, t.csr_workunit as workunit, t.csr_begintime as begintime, t.csr_endtime as endtime, t.csr_position as position, t.csr_witness as witness from cis_surwork_record t where csr_surid = #{surid} order by t.csr_endtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into CIS_SURVEYOR (CS_ID, CS_UID, CS_ORGANID, CS_CERTID, CS_ORGANNAME, CS_YCSNAME, CS_YCSCERTNUM, CS_SHIPCHECKTIME, CS_SEX, CS_BIRTHDATE, CS_PROVCODE, CS_EDUCERTCODE, CS_MAJORNAME, CS_EDUCERTCODE1, CS_MAJORNAME1, CS_POSITIONNAME, CS_LEADERSTATUS, CS_OCEANYEAR, CS_IDT, CS_UDT, CS_STATE, CS_PROVNAME, CS_TELPHONE, CS_EMAIL) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycscertnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipchecktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educertcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educertcode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oceanyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptpopption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idt,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{udt,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into CIS_SURVEYOR
CS_ID,
CS_UID,
CS_ORGANID,
CS_CERTID,
CS_ORGANNAME,
CS_YCSNAME,
CS_YCSCERTNUM,

CS_IDT,
CS_UDT,
CS_STATE,
CS_PROVNAME,
CS_TELPHONE,
CS_EMAIL,

mapper.select: select count(*) from cis_surwork_record where csr_surid = #{surid}
mapper.update:
update CIS_SURVEYOR
CS_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_UID = #{record.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_ORGANID = #{record.organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_CERTID = #{record.certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_ORGANNAME = #{record.organname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_YCSNAME = #{record.ycsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_YCSCERTNUM = #{record.ycscertnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_SHIPCHECKTIME = #{record.shipchecktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_BIRTHDATE = #{record.birthdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_PROVCODE = #{record.provcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_EDUCERTCODE = #{record.educertcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_MAJORNAME = #{record.majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_EDUCERTCODE1 = #{record.educertcode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_MAJORNAME1 = #{record.majorname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_POSITIONNAME = #{record.positionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_LEADERSTATUS = #{record.leaderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_OCEANYEAR = #{record.oceanyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_IDT = #{record.idt,jdbcType=OTHER},
CS_UDT = #{record.udt,jdbcType=OTHER},
CS_STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_PROVNAME = #{record.provname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_TELPHONE = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CIS_SURVEYOR set CS_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_UID = #{record.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_ORGANID = #{record.organid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_CERTID = #{record.certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_ORGANNAME = #{record.organname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_YCSNAME = #{record.ycsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_YCSCERTNUM = #{record.ycscertnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_SHIPCHECKTIME = #{record.shipchecktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_BIRTHDATE = #{record.birthdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_PROVCODE = #{record.provcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_EDUCERTCODE = #{record.educertcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_MAJORNAME = #{record.majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_EDUCERTCODE1 = #{record.educertcode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_MAJORNAME1 = #{record.majorname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_POSITIONNAME = #{record.positionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_LEADERSTATUS = #{record.leaderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_OCEANYEAR = #{record.oceanyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_IDT = #{record.idt,jdbcType=OTHER}, CS_UDT = #{record.udt,jdbcType=OTHER}, CS_STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_PROVNAME = #{record.provname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_TELPHONE = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select:
select count(1) from cis_surveyor WHERE CS_STATE='0' and CS_LOGOUT_STATUS!='1'
AND CS_ORGANID like #{likeStr}

select count(distinct t1.CS_YCSCERTNUM) from cis_surveyor t1 inner join cis_surcertificate t2 on t1.cs_uid=t2.cs_ycscertnum where t2.cs_major =#{major} and t1.CS_LOGOUT_STATUS!='1' and t1.CS_DEL_FLAG!='1'
AND t1.CS_ORGANID like #{likeStr}
